column5: This is great---did you paint this?
Nice, Thanks for the mental image.
Great scene there.  I'm now daydreaming about it......  Hey wait...I know that spot....if you look back at the painting tomorrow you'll see a hundred guys fishing that spot....hehe.
Reminds me of the Manotick mill on the Rideau, where I mastered the art of catching rock bass.  Brings back a lot of good memories.
my parents had that picture!  Cheers!

I allso grew up near a pool and mill like that , this time of year the suckers would come in like crazy and i would sit on the bank like that and catch them all day .Great memories of a simpler time , thaks
